creator: xmehaut@apri-group.com
text:
The run.bat is not correct. To use it , we must write the following :
@echo off
set CP2=%
CLASSPATH%;../classes/;../lib/webdav.jar;../lib/jaxp.jar;../lib/crimson.jar;../l
ib/commons-httpclient.jar
java -classpath %CP2% org.apache.webdav.cmd.Slide %1 %2 %3 %4 %5 %6 %7 %8 %9

regards
Xavier

creator: ib@fiz-chemie.de
text:
I guess, you are calling run.bat from the dist/bin directory, but you are
supposed to start it from the dist directory. If it shouldn't work even so,
please attach a patch or the complete and working run.bat.
This is working in the current client.
creator: mvdb@apache.org
